attributes.review: i downloaded this app expecting true words and awesome things, but i saw v scaring images of a greasy man and i got hacked and he got all my information including my address and so they came to my house and impaled me through the chest with a tr*mp 2020 flag pole. i'm writing this watching donald trump laugh over my dying body. do not download goodbye.
